Engineering

Mini synthesizer and sequencer (2024)


Providence, RI
Teensy 4.2, Teensy Audio Shield, C

Mini synthesizer/sequencer using Teensy 4.2 and Teensy Audio Shield.

Fractal turbulence grid for wind turbine performance (2023)


Breuer Lab, Brown University
Baltic birch ply, 3D-printed PLA, vacuum cup mounts

Turbulence-generating grid for wind turbine performance testing in a wind tunnel.

Persistence-of-vision 3D display (2022)


LEMS, Brown University
Masonite, glass mirrors, projector

Small, low-cost persistence-of-vision 3D display developed with with the Laboratory for Engineering Man-Machine Systems at Brown University.

Soft robotic worm for soil-sensing (2022)


Organic Robotics Lab, Cornell University
3D-printed resin parts, compressed air, arduino nano, sensors

Earthworm-inspired, soil-swimming robot for agriculutural soil sensing. Developed gait patterns and steering for a worm composed of soft pneumatic actuators

Passively-actuated legs for krill robot (2022)


Wilhelmus Lab, Brown University
3D-printed PLA, laser-cut acrylic, arduino, CAD

Passively-actuated krill appendage for the Wilhelmus lab at Brown University.

Bat-inspired flapping-wing robot (2021)


Breuer Lab, Brown University
3D-printed resin parts, metal hardware, pink foam, stepper motors

Fabrication and assembly of a bat-inspired flapping-wing robot with PhD student, Xiaozhou Fan.
